content:
I'm so glad to hear that! You're taking the first steps towards finding a place to call your own, and that's something to be proud of. Remember, it's okay to ask for help, and don't be afraid to reach out to your network or seek guidance from a housing navigator.

**Additional encouragement:**

1. **Stay positive and persistent:** Finding an apartment can be a challenging process, but don't give up. Stay focused, and remember that each "no" brings you closer to the "yes" you're looking for.
2. **Celebrate small wins:** Acknowledge and celebrate each small victory, like finding a promising lead or completing a successful apartment viewing. This will help you stay motivated and encouraged throughout the process.
3. **Take care of yourself:** Remember to prioritize your physical and emotional well-being during this time. Make sure to get enough rest, eat well, and take breaks when needed.

**Final thoughts:**

You've overcome so much already, and I have no doubt that you'll find a place to call your own soon. Remember that you're not alone in this journey, and there are people and resources available to support you.

Keep me updated on your progress, and don't hesitate to reach out if you need any further guidance or just need someone to talk to. You got this!

Best of luck in your apartment search!
